items.title: Balotelli tekent in de Emiraten bij hekkensluiter van tweede niveau
items.summary: Georginio Wijnaldum heeft er een nieuwe, illustere ploeggenoot bij. Mario Balotelli komt de gelederen van Al-Ettifaq versterken. De Italiaanse spits zat sinds zijn vertrek bij Genoa vorige zomer zonder club.

items.title: FA Cup third round buildup, Macclesfield magic, WSL and a big clash in Serie A ‚Äì matchday live
items.summary: ‚öΩ All the latest ahead of Saturday‚Äôs football action ‚öΩ Link in here | Fixtures | Mail us Speaking of Scotland, Martin O‚ÄôNeill returned as Celtic‚Äôs caretaker manager after the sacking of Wilfried Nancy and oversaw a 4-0 win against Dundee United yesterday. One Rangers fan is pining for the Nancy days already. There are another eight FA Cup third-round matches on the agenda today. Fratton Park will be rocking for the visit of Arsenal as Portsmouth host the Gunners for just the second time since 2009. Manchester United, still led by interim interim manager Darren Fletcher, are at home to Brighton, who usually enjoy a trip to Old Trafford. Derby v Leeds (12pm GMT) Portsmouth v Arsenal (2pm) Hull v Blackburn (2.30pm) Norwich v Walsall (2.30pm) Sheffield Utd v Mansfield (2.30pm) Swansea v West Brom (2.30pm) West Ham v QPR (2.30pm) Manchester Utd v Brighton (4.30pm) Continue reading...

items.title: Ayew legt uit waarom hij ondanks gesprekken met andere clubs voor NAC koos
items.summary: Andr√© Ayew gelooft in het plan dat NAC Breda met hem heeft. De 36-jarige Ghanees heeft een fraai curriculum vitae opgebouwd in de afgelopen jaren en is nu neergestreken in Breda. Zaterdag maakte hij zijn debuut tegen FC Groningen.

items.title: Nieuw jaar, oud probleem bij FC Twente: 'Huilen met de pet op'
items.summary: Daan Rots begon de tweede competitiehelft zoals hij de eerste afsloot: vol frustratie over de vele gemiste kansen van FC Twente. Het euvel dat zijn ploeg vlak voor kerst bij Feyenoord parten speelde, en daarvoor ook al herhaaldelijk, was tegen PEC Zwolle alweer terug. Net als in De Kuip kwam een veel beter Twente niet verder dan 1-1. Ook trainer John van den Brom wordt er zo langzamerhand gek van.

items.title: Vaessen voert geslaagde FIFA-truc uit tegen Kemper
items.summary: Jongeren krijgen vaak genoeg te horen dat gamen niets oplevert in het echte leven, maar FC Groningen-keeper Etienne Vaessen bewees zaterdagavond het tegendeel. Hij zette zijn FIFA-kennis in om tegenstander Boy Kemper te foppen.

items.title: Sabalenka goes back-to-back in Brisbane after not dropping set all week
items.summary: World No 1 Aryna Sabalenka captured back-to-back Brisbane International titles as she avoided becoming Marta Kostyuk's latest top-10 scalp in Sunday's final.

items.title: Eredivisie-debutant PSV vertelt welke speler hem bij de hand nam
items.summary: Nicolas Verkooijen is blij met zijn Eredivisie-debuut. De negentienjarige Belg viel zaterdag in bij PSV tegen Excelsior. Joey Veerman nam hem bij de hand.

items.title: ‚ÄòI‚Äôve never celebrated a goal at 9-0 down in my life‚Äô: inside Exeter‚Äôs dressing room on a day to remember
items.summary: League One club offered behind-the-scenes access for FA Cup tie and manager Gary Caldwell will not let crushing loss at Manchester City define them ‚ÄúTake the win today, lads,‚Äù begins Gary Caldwell. Exeter City are two hours from kicking off against Manchester City in the FA Cup third round, and their manager is addressing his players at a hotel shortly before they travel to the Etihad. ‚ÄúYou know why I said that?‚Äù he continues, his thick Scottish accent filling the room. No one knows. He explains the phrase is borrowed from Roberto Mart√≠nez, under whom Caldwell won the competition with Wigan in 2013. It was used to bring humour and break tension when his team were inevitably written off. Continue reading...

items.title: Rams score in final minute to beat Panthers in NFL playoffs
items.summary: Colby Parkinson's touchdown with 38 seconds to play silenced the Carolina Panthers crowd as the Los Angeles Rams escaped with a 34-31 victory to advance to the Divisional Round of the NFL playoffs on Saturday.

items.title: USMNT's Pepi suffers broken arm scoring for PSV
items.summary: United States striker Ricardo Pepi suffered a broken forearm while in action for PSV Eindhoven on Saturday and and is set to be sidelined for two months, the Dutch club has confirmed..

items.title: Buoyant Rosenior lauds 5-star Chelsea start
items.summary: New Chelsea head coach Liam Rosenior promised more to come from his second string after they swept aside Charlton 5-1 at the Valley in his first match in charge.

items.title: Fletcher 'prepared' to lead Man Utd until summer
items.summary: Darren Fletcher has said he's "prepared" if Manchester United decide to hand him the head coach job until the end of the season.

items.title: Why Rosenior sees no need for drastic change at Chelsea
items.summary: Liam Rosenior does not see a need for drastic change at Chelsea - and that was part of the reason he was brought in.

items.title: Another door closes for Spurs and Frank with damaging FA Cup exit
items.summary: After Spurs' damaging FA Cup exit at home to Aston Villa, chief football writer Phil McNulty asks how long can head coach Thomas Frank survive?

items.title: Chelsea thrash Charlton to get Liam Rosenior era off to winning start
items.summary: It sums up the uneasy state of affairs at Chelsea that the new head coach winning his first match in charge was not enough to stop the mutiny. This was a controlled, clinical performance from Liam Rosenior‚Äôs second string, who strolled into the fourth round of the FA Cup after a 5-1 win over a game but limited Charlton Athletic, but once again the big talking point was the travelling support spewing venom in the direction of their unpopular owners. Dissatisfaction with the project is not going away. It did not even matter when Rosenior looked at his bench with Chelsea 3-1 up in the second half and decided to give Estev√£o Willian a runout against tired, lowly Championship opposition. The Brazilian winger is one of the best young players in the world and his runs were soon making Charlton‚Äôs defenders dizzy, but even signings like Est√™v√£o have done little to sway the view of a fanbase united in opposition to an ownership almost four years in and still to convince naysayers that their unique vision will bring success. Continue reading...
